Hello.
I'm Suresh

A front-end web developer who loves to design rich interactive sites.

My Expertise

I am well specialized in all aspects of the design and development process.

Strategy

I collaborate with clients to first fully understand the project and then transform ideas into a well thought out design that accomplishes its purpose.

Design

I sketch and wireframe user interfaces focusing on creating a rich user experience. All my designs start with a blank canvas so that your content decides the layout.

Code

I design in the browser with HTML5, CSS3 and some JS (mostly vanilla). And I love to code things from scratch or using my own pre-built components.

My Skillset

I can efficiently work with all the modern tools and techniques of a web developer.

HTML5

CSS3

Javascript

Jquery

Sass

Postcss

Git

Photoshop

So... Who Am I?

I’m Suresh Vyas, a web designer and front-end web developer in Indore (MP), India. I’ve always had an interest in computer science but my interest in web development peaked in around February 2018 and I started learning almost everything that caughtmy attention since then. Currently I’m playing around with advanced JS, learning more about UX and then thinking about gettng my hands on React or Vue (probably React).

And also... do I always keep my hair like that? Yeah, until they start to annoy me and I can't see the screen with my right eye. Then I sometimes shave them all :)
